Public NotInheritable Class PolyBezierSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class PolyBezierSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示一條或多條三次方貝茲曲線。

span.span: Represents one or more cubic Bezier curves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用儲存物件物件和其他區段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 三次方貝茲曲線由四個點所定義： 起點、 結束點和兩個控制點。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point and two control points. A藉由設定指定一或多個三次方貝茲曲線的點集合的屬性。A specifies one or more cubic Bezier curves by setting the property to a collection of points. 針對每個集合中的三個點，第一個和第二個點指定曲線的兩個控制點，然後第三個點指定的結束點。For every three points in the collection, the first and second points specify the two control points of the curve and the third point specifies the end point. 請注意，因為起始點的最後一個區段的結束點相同，確認已指定沒有曲線開始點。Note that no start point for the curve is specified because start point is the same as the end point of the last segment. 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一個控制點影響的開頭部分的曲線。第二個控制點會影響曲線的結束部分。The first control point affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point affects the ending portion of the curve. 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用繪製兩個三次方貝茲曲線。The following example shows how to use a to draw two cubic Bezier curves. [!code-xaml[GeometriesMiscSnippets_snip#PolyBezierSegmentExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/PolyBezierSegmentExample.xaml#polybeziersegmentexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#PolyBezierSegmentCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/PolyBezierSegmentExample.cs#polybeziersegmentcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#PolyBezierSegmentCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/polybeziersegmentexample.vb#polybeziersegmentcodeexamplewholepage)]
